text.div:
HSPC Service Delivery Location Condition value set

The list of codes that describe how the data came into being.

Copyright Statement: Intermountain Healthcare HDD

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/hspc-locationCondition defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
182845 ContaminatedThe assigned service delivery location is currently dirty, awaiting cleaning.
528112801 CleanThe assigned service delivery location has been cleaned, awaiting occupancy.
182843 OccupiedThe assigned service delivery location is currently occupied.

name: HSPC Service Delivery Location Condition value set
description: The list of codes that describe how the data came into being.

concept.definition: The assigned service delivery location is currently dirty, awaiting cleaning.
The assigned service delivery location has been cleaned, awaiting occupancy.
The assigned service delivery location is currently occupied.
